archimate:Requirement.name: SA-4(12): Acquisition Process | Data Ownership
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Include organizational data ownership requirements in the acquisition contract; and (b) Require all data to be removed from the contractorâ€™s system and returned to the organization within [Assignment: organization-defined time frame].

properties.value: Contractors who operate a system that contains data owned by an organization initiating the contract have policies and procedures in place to remove the data from their systems and/or return the data in a time frame defined by the contract.
